I’m Martina Tan, an artist & designer based in Boston, Massachusetts.

I'm from Mount Laurel, NJ, but I currently split my time between Tufts & the SMFA as a fourth-year Combined Degree student. In 2021, I’ll be graduating with two degrees in Cognitive and Brain Science and Visual Art, plus a Computer Science minor.

Art & design have been my most persistent passions since elementary school, when I would jump at any chance to meticulously sketch & hand-write all of my project posters. I still love all manners of creating by hand, but I've also expanded my toolbox into the digital realms of programming & prototyping.

I find joy in collaborating with people of diverse backgrounds throughout my design process, with the goal of achieving solutions that are audience-conscious & accessible.

Download my résumé, and check out the links above to learn more about me through my work!
